meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>hate</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to hate</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to detest</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: What do you hate and detest more than anything? <reading>肉</reading> (にく). That stuff is gross, and you detest it.
